item.title: Poly – A Modular UI Kit Built with Sass
item.description:
Poly is a simple, repsonsive UI toolkit for everyone to share and enjoy! It was designed by Mat Helme and built by Guil Hernandez using many of the best practices and principles of modular Sass. Poly’s versatility makes it the perfect toolkit for your next website, prototype, or blog. In fact, we used Poly to build Sass break.

To learn how we built Poly, watch the Modular CSS with Sass course on Treehouse. You can also grab the files on GitHub, or check it out on CodePen:

See the Pen Poly – A simple, modular UI kit built with Sass by Guil H (@Guilh) on CodePen.

item.title: South Florida Sass Meetup
item.description:
In an effort to grow—and get to know—the awesome Sass community in South Florida, we’ve started a new meetup to talk about all things Sass!

The meetups will consist of meet and greets followed by talks and presentations by local designers and developers. We’re currently searching the Palm Beach County area for the perfect venue.

If you’re in the South Florida area, we’d love to have you! Follow @sflsass on Twitter for updates.
